sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import Navbar from "../components/Navbar"; import Footer from "../components/Footer"; import "./BuyMilk.css"; const BuyMilk = () => { const [selectedQuantity, setSelectedQuantity] = useState(1); const [cart, setCart] = useState([]); // Single milk product data const milkProduct = { id: 1, name: "Fresh Organic Whole Milk", description: "Premium organic whole milk from grass-fed cows. Rich in nutrients, natural flavor, and perfect for daily consumption. Our milk is pasteurized and packaged fresh daily.", price: 4.99, // Price per litre originalPrice: 5.99, image: "ðŸ¥›", rating: 4.8, reviews: 124, inStock: true, farm: "Green Valley Farm", delivery: "Same day delivery", organic: true, lactoseFree: false, fatContent: "3.25%", source: "Grass-fed cows", bestBefore: "7 days", storage: "Refrigerate at 2-4Â°C", nutrition: { calories: "150 kcal", protein: "8g", carbs: "12g", fat: "8g", calcium: "300mg" }, features: [ "100% Organic", "Grass-fed cows", "No artificial hormones", "Pasteurized", "Fresh daily" ] }; // Available litre options const litreOptions = [ { value: 0.5, label: "0.5 Litres", price: milkProduct.price * 0.5 }, { value: 1, label: "1 Litre", price: milkProduct.price * 1 }, { value: 1.5, label: "1.5 Litres", price: milkProduct.price * 1.5 }, { value: 2, label: "2 Litres", price: milkProduct.price * 2 }, { value: 3, label: "3 Litres", price: milkProduct.price * 3 }, { value: 5, label: "5 Litres", price: milkProduct.price * 5 }, { value: 10, label: "10 Litres", price: milkProduct.price * 10 } ]; // Add to cart const addToCart = () => { const cartItem = { ...milkProduct, quantity: selectedQuantity, totalPrice: milkProduct.price * selectedQuantity }; setCart([cartItem]); }; // Update quantity const updateQuantity = (newQuantity) => { setSelectedQuantity(newQuantity); }; // Calculate total price const totalPrice = milkProduct.price * selectedQuantity; const savings = milkProduct.originalPrice - milkProduct.price; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Choose your quantity and enjoy farm-fresh milk delivered to your doorstep

{/* Main Content */}
{/* Product Image and Basic Info */}
{milkProduct.image} {milkProduct.originalPrice > milkProduct.price && (
{Math.round((savings / milkProduct.originalPrice) * 100)}% OFF
)}

{milkProduct.description}

{'â˜…'.repeat(Math.floor(milkProduct.rating))} {milkProduct.rating} ({milkProduct.reviews} reviews)
{milkProduct.features.map((feature, index) => ( {feature} ))}
{/* Product Specifications */}

Product Specifications

Fat Content: {milkProduct.fatContent}
Source: {milkProduct.source}
Best Before: {milkProduct.bestBefore}
Storage: {milkProduct.storage}
Farm: {milkProduct.farm}
Delivery: {milkProduct.delivery}
{/* Nutrition Information */}

Nutrition Facts (per litre)

{milkProduct.nutrition.calories} Calories
{milkProduct.nutrition.protein} Protein
{milkProduct.nutrition.carbs} Carbohydrates
{milkProduct.nutrition.fat} Fat
{milkProduct.nutrition.calcium} Calcium
{/* Purchase Section */}

Select Quantity & Purchase

{/* Price Display */}
${milkProduct.price}
per litre {milkProduct.originalPrice > milkProduct.price && ( ${milkProduct.originalPrice} )}
{/* Quantity Selection */}

{/* Custom Quantity Input */}

{/* Total Price */}
Total Price: ${totalPrice.toFixed(2)}
{savings > 0 && (
You save: ${savings.toFixed(2)}
)}
{/* Add to Cart Button */} {/* Cart Summary */} {cart.length > 0 && (

Added to Cart

{milkProduct.name} {selectedQuantity} litres
${totalPrice.toFixed(2)}
)}
); }; export default BuyMilk;
